name: Space Rider Jet Pack Co.
overview: As chief test pilot for the "SPACE RIDER" Jet Pack Company you have been sent to the 23rd planet to test the latest S.R. Mk8 Jet Pack. Whilst on the planet you have a second project - to collect important and valuable minerals for use in the S.R. research lab. The job is not quite so easy though, as well as having unusual gravity on P23, the natural underground cave structure is guarded with extensive security features placed by an alien power who claim the planet is their property. Not being put off by such meagre threats you sett of on your mission.
